I have been recording for EVP's all week because of
  the full moon. I have been very lucky this week.
  I have heard a lot of different voices. Angel
  

LON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
          i think that hes talking about, like EVP, where some people automatically get messages and others NEVER get em. 

Staten Island Paranormal <SIParanormalSociety@...> wrote:       That would be awesome, but Chris said not everyone would be able to use 
them? Is that true, Frank, that only certain people were supposed to 
be able to use the boxes?

Amy
SIParanormal
